import.title: Upload Sessions
import.description: Create and upload a new sessions

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Edit your personal settings and details

dialog.title: Create Flyers
dialog.description: Please choose the type of flyer and number of pages you want to print.

template.title: Flyers without Codes
template.info: PDF to send to a print service

codes.title: Flyers with Codes only
codes.info: PDF to print over flyers without codes

loading.title: Creating Flyers
loading.description: Please wait till your flyers are generated. This process can take a while.

dialog.title: Upload sessions
dialog.description: Select and upload all photos of your sessions. These must always include the photos of the customer with the corresponding photo of the QR Code.

upload.title: Uploading sessions
upload.description: Please wait till your photos are uploaded. This process can take a while.

scan.title: Scanning sessions
scan.description: Please wait till your photos are scanned and sorted. This process can take a while.

verify.title: Confirm structure
verify.description: Please check and confirm the shown structure of your scanned photos. Mark errors, wrong groupings and incorrect scanned codes to avoid wrong photos in wrong sessions.
verify.rename: Please correct the code for this session:
verify.taken: The chosen name is already taken by another session. Duplicates are not allowed. Please chose a different name for this session.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.text: Your avatar will be visible on the flyers and in the store. Enter a direct URL to your avatar below:

password.title: Password
password.text: Enter a new password for your account below:

background.title: Background
background.text: Your background will be visible on the top of each flyer. Enter a direct URL to your background below:

mail.title: PayPal Email
mail.text: The money of each purchase will be transfered to the PayPal Email below:

priceperalbum.title: Price Per Session
priceperalbum.text: Enter the price per session below. Each customer needs to pay this amount to download/unlock his session.

priceperphoto.title: Price Per Photo
priceperphoto.text: Enter the price per photo below. Each customer needs to pay this amount to download/unlock a single photo from his session.
